abstract: Manhattan jury in trial of Pedro Hernandez, accused of murdering Etan Patz in 1979, asks to peruse testimony from federal prosecutor and senior FBI agent who had gone after different suspect, Jose A Ramos.
lead_paragraph: On a sixth full day of deliberations, the jury asked to review testimony from a federal prosecutor and a senior F.B.I. agent who had pursued a different suspect, Jose A. Ramos.

headline.main: Jury in Etan Patz Case to Revisit Testimony About a Different Suspect
headline.print_headline: Patz Jury to Revisit Testimony About a Different Suspect

snippet: On a sixth full day of deliberations, the jury asked to review testimony from a federal prosecutor and a senior F.B.I. agent who had pursued a different suspect, Jose A. Ramos.
